contents.text: Welcome to LaunchDarkly in the East Bay, empowering you to deploy code safely and release features when you’re ready.
For technical support with feature management, press 1.
If you need assistance with feature flags configuration, press 1.
Please hold the line while we connect you to a feature flags specialist from LaunchDarkly; your call is important to us.

navigationGoals: I need to quickly set up and configure feature flags for a new release.
As a former service member turned developer, I need help configuring feature flags for my project.
Assist me with configuring a percentage rollout rule for a new feature flag in production.
I need step-by-step help configuring a feature flag in my application.
I need help configuring feature flags for my simulation code to test different physics models.

contents.text: For help with integration, setup, or API questions, press 2.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our integration support team; we appreciate your patience.

navigationGoals: I need to integrate LaunchDarkly’s API into our CI/CD pipeline.
I'm an ex-military developer and need assistance integrating LaunchDarkly API into our CI/CD pipeline.
I need help integrating the LaunchDarkly Java SDK for server-side flag evaluations.
I need assistance integrating LaunchDarkly into my system and setting up the API.
I’m integrating LaunchDarkly’s Python SDK into my data analysis pipeline and need setup guidance.

contents.text: To speak with our sales team about plans and pricing, press 2.
For information on pricing tiers and subscription options, press 1.
One moment please while we transfer you to our pricing specialists; thank you for choosing LaunchDarkly.

navigationGoals: I want to compare pricing tiers to choose the right plan for our team.
As a veteran entrepreneur, I want details on pricing tiers to choose the right subscription plan.
Could you explain the differences in feature bundle limits and pricing between the Pro and Enterprise plans?
I’d like to review your subscription tiers and find a pricing plan that suits me.
Can you explain your pricing tiers for an academic research group with about ten collaborators?

contents.text: To schedule a live demo and explore features, press 2.
Please hold the line while we arrange your demo; a representative will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: I’d like to schedule a live demo to see how feature management works.
As an ex-military veteran new to LaunchDarkly, I'd like to schedule a live product demo.
I'd like to book a live demo showcasing your A/B testing and feature experimentation workflows.
I want to schedule a live demo so I can see how the system works.
I’d like to schedule a live demo to see how LaunchDarkly can manage experiments in our physics project.
